      • login

        @PostMapping("/login")
public Account login​(@RequestParam
                     java.lang.String email,
                     @RequestParam
                     java.lang.String password)
        Post request to make an account logged in after validate the account existance and matching the email and password from the database (Json Table)
        Parameters:
        email - user's email
        password - user's password
        Returns:
        The account which the email and password are matched from the database

      • register

        @PostMapping("/register")
public Account register​(@RequestParam
                        java.lang.String name,
                        @RequestParam
                        java.lang.String email,
                        @RequestParam
                        java.lang.String password)
        Post request for register feature. This will check whether the parameters match the regex and the email is not being registered yet. This will add a new account to account Json Table.
        Parameters:
        name - account name.
        email - account email.
        password - account password.
        Returns:
        the account which qualified to register.

      • registerStore

        @PostMapping("/{id}/registerStore")
public Store registerStore​(@PathVariable
                           int id,
                           @RequestParam
                           java.lang.String name,
                           @RequestParam
                           java.lang.String address,
                           @RequestParam
                           java.lang.String phoneNumber)
        Post request to register store of an account.
        Parameters:
        id - account id
        name - store name
        address - store address
        phoneNumber - store phone number
        Returns:
        the store being registered

      • topUp

        @PostMapping("/{id}/topUp")
public boolean topUp​(@PathVariable
                     int id,
                     @RequestParam
                     double balance)
        Post request to top up account balance
        Parameters:
        id - account id
        balance - the amount balance to top up
        Returns:
        if success return true, otherwise false
